Package services

Class ProjectAdminService

java.lang.Object
services.ProjectAdminService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IProjectAdmService
public class ProjectAdminService extends Object implements IProjectAdmService
The ProjectAdminService class implements the IProjectAdmService interface and provides methods for managing both staff and inventory. It uses dependency injection for inventory management and handles the interaction with data stores.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProjectAdminService

      public ProjectAdminService(Administrator administrator, IInventoryService inventoryService, UserService userService)
      Constructs a ProjectAdminService with the specified Administrator and IInventoryService. Loads staff data from a CSV file upon initialization.
      Parameters:
      administrator - The administrator managing the service.
      inventoryService - The inventory service to manage inventory-related operations.
      userService - The user service to manage user-related operations.
